name: Space Simulator (itch)
description:
Hi there, I'm Youp, the CEO/Head-Developer of UniFuseStudios. I made a game called: Shoot That Ship. It's a game made in GameMaker: Studio. When I started programming this game, I was a real newbie. I followed HeartBeast's Udemy course for the basics.

I developed the game further and asked some friend for extra textures and ideas.

Description of the game: Shoot that ship is a 2d arcade game. For now you have 2 game modes: Casual and Story.

Description casual: You're a ship with a mission: Shoot all enemies. Each kill you get 5 points, every 100 points, it's got a little more difficult, more enemies will spawn and even begin to shoot you!

You can find 2 different power-ups: +1 Health and Quad shooter. The power=ups and enemies spawn random, so you can't follow the same route.

Description Story: You need a DLC to play this mode! You are Edornan Edquson, a soldier from the SWD (Space Warfare Defense). You must complete missions and collect items to complete the story!

Features we are working on:
Infected - You play as the Enemy Boss Ship. You can spawn alien ships to kill all human ships. The opposite of casual!
Mobile Support - Play on Android, IOS and Windows Phone!
Mac OSX Support - This speaks for itself!

What do we do with the money?

We use it to buy licences for releasing on other platforms!
